movies.title: La belle meunière
movies.plot: Franz Schubert retired from Vienna in country for musical writing. He draws his inspiration from a romance with the watermiller's daughter. An operetta in the fifties Vienna style. This is the only movie from Marcel Pagnol in color and the only movie in rouxcolor, a French experimental process derivated from the agfacolor German process.
movies.simplePlot: Franz Schubert retired from Vienna in country for musical writing. He draws his inspiration from a romance with the watermiller's daughter. An operetta in the fifties Vienna style. This is ...

biography.bio: Tino Rossi broke into films in 1934 with Moscow Nights (1934) but his first real success came with Marinella (1936). All his films were musicals and capitalised on his success as a singer. It is during the Occupation of France by the Germans that his film career reached its peak, notably with Mon amour est près de toi (1943) and L'île d'amour (1944). At the Liberation, the French authorities reproached him for associating with the French Gestapo, but most importantly for actively supporting collaborationist causes such as the LVF (Légion des Volontaires Français) who sent French volunteers to work in German factories. He was arrested in October 1944 and spent three weeks in Fresnes prison (near Paris). Brought to trial in 1945, his sentence was relatively light (unlike his fellow actors Arletty,Mireille Balin, Josseline Gaël or Robert Le Vigan) as he only received a retrospective (and symbolic) work suspension. He then only appeared sporadically in films concentrating on his singing career.
biography.name: Tino Rossi

biography.bio: Jacqueline Pagnol was born on October 6, 1920 in Malakoff, Seine , France as Jacqueline Andrée Bouvier. She was an actress, known for Naïs (1945), Adhémar ou le jouet de la fatalité (1951) and Topaze (1951). She was married to Marcel Pagnol. She died on August 22, 2016 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Jacqueline Pagnol

biography.bio: Raoul Marco was born on November 22, 1892 in Paris, France as Maurice Raoul Mayzaud. He was an actor, known for Beauty and the Beast (1946), La carte forcée (1935) and Liliom (1934). He died on April 3, 1971 in Paris.
biography.name: Raoul Marco

biography.bio: Lilia Vetti was born on September 23, 1923 in Nice, Alpes-Maritimes, France. She was an actress, known for Le chanteur inconnu (1947), Le gardian (1946) and La belle meunière (1948). She was married to Tino Rossi. She died on March 14, 2003 in Ajaccio, Corsica, France.
biography.name: Lilia Vetti

biography.bio: Raphaël Patorni was born on April 15, 1911 in Paris, France. He is known for his work on Trois marins dans un couvent (1950), The Little Rebels (1955) and Casque d'Or (1952). He died on November 27, 1986 in Neuilly-Sur-Seine, France.
biography.name: Raphaël Patorni

biography.bio: Emma Lyonel was born on August 6, 1882 in Lorient, Morbihan, France as Marthe Emma Rogel. She was an actress, known for Les dames du Bois de Boulogne (1945), Panic (1946) and La belle meunière (1948). She died on November 7, 1965 in Neuilly-sur-Seine, Hauts-de-Seine, France.
biography.name: Emma Lyonel

biography.bio: Suzanne Desprès was born on December 16, 1875 in Verdun, Meuse, France. She was an actress, known for Maria Chapdelaine (1934), La porteuse de pain (1923) and Les soeurs ennemies (1915). She was married to Lugné-Poe. She died on July 1, 1951 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Suzanne Desprès

biography.bio: Roger Monteaux was born on July 18, 1879 in Boulogne-Billancourt, Hauts-de-Seine, France as Roger Louis Victor Monteaux. He was an actor, known for Le mémorial de Sainte-Hélène (1911), L'agence Alice ou La sécurité des ménages (1911) and La fin d'un tyran (1909). He died on December 23, 1974 in Monaco.
biography.name: Roger Monteaux

biography.bio: Christian Bertola is an actor, known for Cyrano de Bergerac (1946), Mission à Tanger (1949) and Noix de coco (1962).
biography.name: Christian Bertola

biography.bio: Jean-Paul Coquelin was born in 1924 in Paris, Ile-de-France, France. He was an actor, known for Le Trou (1960), La canne (1972) and Captain Blood (1960). He died on April 25, 2001 in Saint-Germain-en-Laye, Yvelines, France.
biography.name: Jean-Paul Coquelin

biography.bio: Pierrette Rossi is an actress, known for La belle meunière (1948), Je n'aime que toi... (1949) and La patronne (1950).
biography.name: Pierrette Rossi

biography.bio: Gustave Hamilton was born on March 27, 1871 in Brussels, Belgium. He was an actor, known for L'anglais tel qu'on le parle (1931), Maria Chapdelaine (1934) and Le Railway de la mort (1912). He died on January 5, 1951 in Villefranche-sur-Mer, Alpes-Maritimes, France.
biography.name: Gustave Hamilton

biography.bio: Edouard Hemme is an actor, known for Les mains d'Orlac (1960), Crésus (1960) and Sin and Desire (1949).
biography.name: Edouard Hemme

biography.bio: Jules Dorpe is an actor, known for Le signal rouge (1949), La belle meunière (1948) and Le temps des oeufs durs (1958).
biography.name: Jules Dorpe

companyCreditsSimple.name: Société du Film La Belle Meunière
